column1: A Mass of Christian Burial for Mary Jane will be held at 11:00am on Thursday
column2: June 25. with her cousin Msgr. Edward Hankiewicz presiding at Sacred Heart of Jesus Church where she will repose one hour prior to the Mass. Interment Holy Cross Cemetery. Friends can meet the family on Wednesday
column4: and 7 to 9 PM at Arsulowicz Brothers
column8: where the Rosary will be prayed Wednesday 7:30
